â€œBig, broad and brassy. It is full of stereotypes, theatre references, production numbers, and a lot of laughs from characters you learn to love. What sets this show apart, is that it takes a chance, betting against the odds, that an important subject matter can be addressed and resolved, even if heavily sugar coated with humor, song, and dance, as long as real, honest human beings emerge in the process...An incredible cast...These talented performers are exhilarating and a joy to watch."
